charges.charge_description: Consp to import into the U.S. fr the Rep of Mex more than 5 kilogs of cocaine; 21 USC 963, 952(a), 960(b)(1)(B); Offense date: 7/13/03; Penalty: Impris 10 yrs* to life and/or a $4,000,000 fine at least 5 yrs SRT (as to ea ct) (*MANDATORY MINIMUM) (1)

Import into the U.S. fr the Rep of Mex more than 5 kilogs of cocaine, that is, approx 13.44 kilogs; 21 USC 952(a), 960(b)(1)(B), &; 18 USC 2; Offense date: 7/13/03; Penalty: Impris 10 yrs* to life and/or a $4,000,000 fine at leat 5 yrs SRT (as to ea ct) (*MANDATORY MINIMUM) (2)

Consp to posses w/intent to dist more than 5 kilogs of cocaine; 21 USC 846, 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A); Offense date: 7/13/03; Penalty: Impris 10 yrs* to life and/or a $4,000,000 fine at least 5 yrs SRT (as to ea ct) (*MANDATORY MINIMUM) (3)

Possess w/intent to dist more than 5 kilogs of cocaine, that is, approx 13.44 kilogs; 21 USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A) &; 18 USC 2; Offense date: 7/13/03; Penalty: Impris 10 yrs* to life and/or a $4,000,000 fine at least 5 yrs SRT (as to ea ct) (*MANDATORY MINIMUM) (4)
